overview: Dave Schwartz is the CTO of CapLinked, a Los Angeles-based startup that connects entrepreneurs and investors. Previously, Dave founded FuseFinancial to assist start-ups and mid-market companies with capital raising and business development. Prior to founding FuseFinancial, Dave was VP of Technology for the financial services firm National Payment Network (NPN), the nation’s leading provider of loan acceleration programs for the automotive industry. Prior to life in early-stage companies, Dave held technical positions with Motorola and Sun Microsystems, and invented 5 patents from this work on Java.
